title: Yuyao Huang
text:
Download: CV
Collaborative, fast-learning Data Science major with strong communication and a bias for action. I thrive in cross-functional teams, take initiative, and adapt quickly to new challenges. Comfortable moving from data wrangling and analysis to modeling and lightweight pipelines, I use Python/R to convert messy data into clear insights and reproducible workflows. Spring 2026 and subsequent work in Data Science, Data Analytics, or Data Engineering to contribute immediately and deliver measurable value.

title: Yuyao Huang
section: Fires from Space: Australia (Geospatial Modeling & Dashboards) Class Rank: Top 1%
text:
Fires from Space: Australia (Geospatial Modeling & Dashboards) Class Rank: Top 1%

· Collaborated with a 4 member team to analyze 240+ days of satellite and climate data; spatiotemporal analysis surfaced escalation patterns during the 2019-20 “Black Summer.”
· Built geospatial models and interactive dashboards (Python, Tableau) linking fire intensity, air quality, and land use, informing climate-risk and preparedness discussions.

title: Yuyao Huang
section: Student Habits and Academic Success: A Behavioral Analysis (Predictive Modeling) Class Rank: Top 1%
text:
Student Habits and Academic Success: A Behavioral Analysis (Predictive Modeling) Class Rank: Top 1%

· Modeled a dataset of 1000 students; stepwise multiple regression achieved Adj. R² ≈ 0.90, quantifying drivers of academic performance.
· Visualized key positives (sleep, mental health, attendance, etc.) and negatives (social media, Netflix, etc.), delivering a decision-ready report.

title: Yuyao Huang
section: Sleep Health & Lifestyle Analysis (Regression & Diagnostics) Class Rank: Top 1%
text:
Sleep Health & Lifestyle Analysis (Regression & Diagnostics) Class Rank: Top 1%

· Led a 6 member team; engineered transformations to address non-linearity and heteroscedasticity; linear regression reached Adj. R² ≈ 0.83 in R.
· Produced diagnostics and targeted recommendations on sleep quality and activity.

title: Yuyao Huang
section: DataFest 2025: Commercial Site Selection (Competitive Analysis) Entering the final round of selection
text:
DataFest 2025: Commercial Site Selection (Competitive Analysis) Entering the final round of selection

· Led a 5 member team; cleaned post-COVID leasing data in Python; identified Class A rise, suburban spike, and CBD recovery to guide site strategy.
· Advanced to the second round, delivering a blended urban–suburban selection plan with visual evidence.
